Text.Name: SpellEsoterica_1
Text.DisplayName: Jade Letters of the Three Caves
Text.Desc: Taoist secret, it records three kinds of talisman that are very beneficial to self-cultivation.

Text.Name: SpellEsoterica_2
Text.DisplayName: Divine Talismans of the Five Elemental Qi
Text.Desc: Secret manual that records five inner sect talismans.
Text.EffectDesc:
Unlock Talisman: 
Talisman of Departing Shadow
Wonder Talisman
Impermanence Talisman
Talisman of Heavenly Heart
Talisman of Tranquil Heart

Text.Name: SpellEsoterica_3
Text.DisplayName: Golden Book of the Six Edicts and Five Directions
Text.Desc: It records six common and practical talismans that are of great uses to mortals.
Text.EffectDesc:
Unlock Talisman: 
Talisman of Spiritual Travelling
Talisman of Curer
Talisman of Foreseer
Talisman of Spiritual Cleansing
Talisman of Fasting
Talisman of Qi Absorption
Talisman of Lasting Joy

Text.Name: SpellEsoterica_4
Text.Desc: A secret collection of talismans passed down by the royal family. They come from immortals who were given titles by Emperors in past dynasties.
Text.EffectDesc:
Unlock Talisman: 
Talisman of Supreme Yang
Talisman of Supreme Yin
Talisman of Civil Prosperity
Talisman of Military Prosperity
Talisman of Diligence
Talisman of Craftsmanship
Talisman of Fertility
Talisman of Medicinal Mastery

Text.Name: SpellEsoterica_5
Text.Desc: A rather complete collection, it contains most of the common talismans.
Text.EffectDesc:
Unlock Talisman: 
Talisman of Spiritual Cleansing
Talisman of Fasting
Talisman of Lasting Joy
Talisman of Supreme Yang
Talisman of Supreme Yin
Talisman of Diligence
Talisman of Craftsmanship
Talisman of Fertility
Talisman of Medicinal Mastery

Text.Name: SpellEsoterica_6
Text.Desc: Mysterious illustrations from another realm, it documented a lot of cultures and customs of a great nation.
Text.EffectDesc:
Unlock Talisman: 
Illustration of Everlasting Prosperity
Illustration of Everlasting Status
Illustration of Everlasting Longevity

Unlock Buildings: 
Prosperity Lantern
Harmony Lantern
Roof (Spring)
Roof (Festival)
Firework (Dragon)
